title: Cartman Gets an Anal Probe
description: Cartman explains the odd nightmare he had about alien visitors abducting him.

title: Weight Gain 4000
description: Cartman's environmental essay wins a national contest, and Kathie Lee Gifford comes to South Park to present the award.

title: Volcano
description: The boys go on a hunting trip with the guidance of Mr. Hankey and face a volcano eruption.

title: Terrance and Phillip in Not Without My Anus
description: Kyle's parents take him to Canada to celebrate a holiday with Terrance and Phillip.

title: Chef Goes Nanners
description: Chef protests the South Park flag, leading to a town uproar.

title: Cancelled
description: The boys discover the world is a TV show and try to stop it from being cancelled.
